Interests

There is much that I enjoy besides working on becoming a better programmer. I also enjoy most outdoor activities, including tennis, kayaking, and as of recently, skiing as well. I am always looking to try new things, and actively participate in recreational sports leagues as often as I can, the most recent of which being a volleyball league under VOLO.

During my time indoors, I try to improve my language skills with Duolingo. So far I've put the most work into Italian, but also love learning Spanish and Portuguese as well. When not doing that, I am not immune to an occasional game of Smash Bros or Rocket League, or any other lightly competitve activity with friends like board games.

A Laravel Blog
PHPizza

This is an application made in Laravel 9. It is an ongoing blog project I will be using to rate & review the pizza I try. It has some authentication, but does not utilize breeze or jetstream (yet).

A React To-Do
ToDo in React

I'm learning react! This is a very simple to do list. Task can be deleted from the UI, new ones can be added, and reminders can be toggled by double clicking. There is no back-end tied to it yet, but I may evolve the app by having it make API calls with JSON-server.
